name: Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road Victory
overview: Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road Victory (ドラゴンクエスト モンスターバトルロードビクトリー) is a 2010 Dragon Quest spinoff game released for the Nintendo Wii. It is related to the Japan-only arcade games Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road, Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road II, Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road II Legend and Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road Scanner. Players are able to customize their character's appearance, a system similar to that of Dragon Quest IX. Like every Dragon Quest game in the series, Victory introduced a few new monsters, including Gadis and the dark lancer.
